basics.name: AJ Patalinghog
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am currently studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2023.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

work.company: UH Manoa College of Natural Sciences
highlights: Instruct, guide and assist students with mathematical concepts ranging from Trigonometry to Calculus IV
Assessing students needs and learning style to provide effective guidance

work.company: UH Manoa Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering
work.summary: Teaching laboratory sessions for various engineering courses
highlights: Preparing, teaching, and demonstrating labs to reinforce students understanding of course material
Communicating with supervising professor on students progress, grading, and class schedule

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Undergraduate students are awarded the Dean's List distinction if they earn a semester grade point average of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits or more taken for a grade.

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship awarded to first-time degree-seeking students who have a minimum high school GPA of 3.8.
